verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: during an impromptu news conference Friday morning] [ARG1: that he was considering pardoning boxing legend Muhammad Ali] .
President Donald Trump said during an impromptu news conference Friday morning that he [V: was] considering pardoning boxing legend Muhammad Ali .
